localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Tiny stocks watcher for the menu bar. Add your favorite tickers to always see the current price. Powered by Yahoo Finance API. Buy on the Mac App Store for $0.99 or free install via Xcode. For any further information or features, feel free to contact me.

nodes.excerpt: Simple web-based game, best played over video call with friends! All players see a random word's category; all but one player (the liar) see the word. Take turns describing the word; at the end, collectively vote on who the liar is. ( https://github.com/fibanneacci/liar)
nodes.title: who's the liar? - Play this simple web-based game with your friends!
nodes.author: Anne Li

nodes.title: Chat for VSCode - Chat with your Slack and Discord teams from within VS Code
nodes.author: Abdelilah Hicham

nodes.excerpt: A collective list of more than 1000 Free Public and Open REST APIs for developers like movie APIs, Anime APIs, weather APIs, music APIs, games and comics APIs, currency APIs, sports APIs, science APIs, open data APIs, etc.
nodes.title: Public APIs 3.0 - A collective list of public apis, tools, & knowledge base.

nodes.excerpt: Exclusive selection of the most important news in fintech delivered to your inbox weekly. All of the news, none of the useless filler.

nodes.excerpt: Crucial Human Theme is a VSCode IDE dark theme dressed in royal purple and designed to keep you focused. Click "Get It" to install it from the Visual Studio Marketplace or simply search for "Crucial Human" from inside VSCode -> Extensions.
nodes.title: Crucial Human Theme for VSCode - A royal dark theme for VSCode

nodes.title: Stonksfolio - Gain insight into the performance of stock & ETF investments

nodes.excerpt: TweetPik is a web app that allows you to create easily convert tweets to images SVG, PNG and JPG. Adjust the size, theme and elements on the screen.
nodes.title: TweetPik - Easily convert tweets to images SVG, PNG and JPG
nodes.author: Bruno Quaresma

nodes.excerpt: Power People Platform is a free design library of 3D avatars. Made with love â¤ï¸ for more fun and color in your work. They are perfect for your mockups, presentations, storyboards or any other creative project you are working on. Available as Photoshop files.
nodes.title: Power People Platform - Free illustration library of 3D avatars - Made with love â¤ï¸

nodes.title: rysolv - Fix open source issues, get paid

nodes.title: Friendly Line Icon Set - 150+ meticulously crafted line icons

nodes.excerpt: 11 ports USB-C hub, wireless charger, laptop stand designed in one. Create a workspace that is more comfortable and efficient anywhere.

nodes.excerpt: Autonomously generate tests based on how your users are using your app in production. The easiest way to build automated tests for your website or mobile app. And, record the tests using browser plugin and maintain them as plain English tests.

nodes.title: Scrum Study Cards - An easy to understand overview of the Scrum framework.

nodes.excerpt: SpoofSense is a powerful AI algorithm that detects Live v/s Spoof Faces in an Image. It uses Deep Learning to detect Print/Digital Spoof Faces and authenticates Real Faces using just a picture.
nodes.title: SpoofSense - AI for Face Liveness Detection

nodes.excerpt: Pictogram makes it easy to use custom app icons on your Mac. It even preserves your custom icons after your apps update themselves. Requires macOS 11.0 or newer.
nodes.title: Pictogram - Customize macOS app icons with ease
